title: League of Legends Isn't Working
body: When I try to open League of Legends, it just says PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working. How do I fix this?

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel errors are generally caused by League not being assigned proper permissions to run. Because League interacts with a lot of files outside the Riot Games folder, it needs the authorization to do so. To ensure League can run, assign it admin permissions with [our guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

Let me know if this helped.
